author: P Gauci
content:
Decided to try this place on Sunday as my girlfriend had read about it online and said it had great reviews. The whole layout and building is very quirky and interesting - what a shame about the food.

It was supposed to be £4.50 for 2 portions of veg, 1 meat and a portion of rice. We ordered a plate each and a small plate of salad on the side - this came to £15!  The food was mediocre, there were four small pieces of lamb in the dish that I had and a similar amount in the chicken curry my girlfriend had.

I was going to make a complaint but there was a large queue and I had to return to the car as the parking was running out. Left this place as hungry as when we entered and ended up going elsewhere. Wont be returning.
